subNodes.conversationText: root

[Despite the warmth of the Flame Stone, evening approaches with a deep, winter-like chill.]||***ga_jump-->String::pc_vig_wp String::$PC_SPEAKER Float::0 ***ga_jump-->String::vroman_vig_wp String::vroman Float::0 ***ga_jump-->String::ianth_vig_wp String::ianth Float::0 ***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False String::gossam ||

[The Knights of the Ruby Rose have joined the Stag Warriors outside the circle of the stone, as have Vroman and Gossam. Ianth remains inside, keeping her vigil; you stand near her. She has been silent for the past few hours, but finally she turns to you and speaks in a soft voice.]|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::6 |

[Despite the warmth of the Flame Stone, evening approaches with a deep, winter-like chill.]|***ga_jump-->String::pc_vig_wp String::$PC_SPEAKER Float::0 ***ga_jump-->String::vroman_vig_wp String::vroman Float::0 ***ga_jump-->String::ianth_vig_wp String::ianth Float::0 |

[The Knights of the Ruby Rose have joined the Stag Warriors outside the circle of the stone, as has Vroman. Ianth remains inside, keeping her vigil; you stand near her. She has been silent for the past few hours, but finally she turns to you and speaks in a soft voice.]|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::5 |
You do not have to wait up with me, you know.  You will need rest for whatever happens tomorrow.

I know that, Ianth.  But I would not be able to rest easily with the thought of you standing here alone in the cold.|***ga_global_int-->String::courteous    String::++    ***ga_global_int-->String::sympathetic    String::++    |

I thank you, , for staying with me. It is indeed good to have you here...[Shivering as a gust of wind leaps up from the north, shaking the trees--] By Sune! The wind bites tonight.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::True String::ianth_romance String::0 |
Give me your hand, Ianth.  Mine is warm.|***ga_move-->String::pc_vig_wp    Int::0    String::ianth    |

[Ianth's hand is smooth and cold and surprisingly tender. She says nothing, but her grasp is firm, and she looks almost shyly into your eyes. She withdraws her hand after a few minutes and smiles.] I must keep my vigil.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::200 Int::0 |
|***ga_fade_to_black-->Float::5    Float::0    Int::0    |

[You fall asleep leaning against the Flame Stone; the magical fire is warm but not as hot as mundane fire. An exclamation from Ianth startles you from your dreams--]|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False String::ianth_romance String::1 |

Look, , look! [Ianth points to the base the Flame Stone, where a small clump of white flowers is growing before your very eyes. They shoot forth, bud, and bloom in a matter of seconds.]|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::3 ***ga_face_target-->String::$PC_SPEAKER String::benedick Int::0 ***ga_face_target-->String::ianth String::benedick Int::0 ***ga_play_animation-->String::ianth Int::123 Float::0 Float::0 Float::1 ***ga_music_stop-->|
This must be the moment you were waiting for, Ianth.
[Ianth's excitement abates, and she looks doubtfully at the flowers.] But these are not the goddess's red roses. They are white, and look more like common daisies.
They do not look like roses to me.
And yet they are beautiful, and their growth here and now can't be a coincidence.
I shall pick one and see what comes of it.

[When Ianth plucks the flower, a heavenly light illuminates her for a moment. She stands rapt for a few minutes. Her eyes widen--]|***ga_effect-->String::Visual String:: String::I Int::70 String::ianth |

My pilgrimage is complete.  The goddess has granted me a vision, a purpose, and a new name.|***ga_jump-->String::vig_wp_maerdred    String::maerdred_vig    Float::0    ***ga_jump-->String::vig_wp_lorimer    String::lorimer_vig    Float::0    ***ga_jump-->String::vig_wp_valeria    String::valeria_vig    Float::0    ***ga_music_set-->Int::65    Int::0    ***ga_music_play-->|
[The Knights of the Ruby Rose have gathered nearby, astonished.] Truly, Sister Ianth? A vision?

Yes.  But I will not speak of that.  It was too sad and too lovely for words.  You need only know that Sune has laid to rest an old love and given me the hope of a new. The roses of spring have come and gone; the chrysanthemum of the fall is my flower.
Therefore, Brother Maerdred, my title henceforth is Knight-Errant of the Chrysanthemum! And my purpose, Maerdred--[Ianth pauses, recalling something from her vision--]
--My purpose is with . [Ianth's eyes glisten as she looks at you fondly.] I would have it no other way.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False String::ianth_romance String::1 |

So be it, Knight of the Ruby Rose, Knight-Errant of the Chrysanthemum, and Sister Ianth!|***ga_give_feat-->String::ianth    Int::16778918    Int::0    Int::0    ***ga_give_xp-->Int::500    Int::0    |
The goddess has granted you this vision not a moment too soon, Sister Ianth.  I saw the twinkle of torchlight on the eastern horizon not fifteen minutes hence.
And I beheld the forces coming up from the south.
Then we must ready ourselves.
How are we going to hold this place against so many?
The power of the Flame Stone will not let any hostile force approach the circle.  We shall show them that, armed with Sune's power, even the few can prevail against the many.
I still fear what my vision foretold, Brother Maerdred.
As do I.  But we can do nothing but trust in our goddess, Sister Valeria.  Would she have granted Ianth her vision if all was to come to naught?
Make sure your companions, the rogue and the halfling priest, are awake and ready to fight.  Report to me when you are prepared.|***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False    String::gossam    |
|***ga_journal-->String::Q_MANFRED    Int::90    Int::0    Int::0    Int::0    ***ga_destroy-->String::flamestone_worldmap    Int::0    Float::0    |
Make sure that your roguish friend is awake and ready to fight.  Report to me when you are prepared.
--My purpose is with <FirstName>.
[Say nothing.]
[You eventually fall asleep in the cold, just beyond the circle of warmth provided by the Flame Stone. An exclamation from Ianth startles you from your dreams, and you approach her--]
[Without speaking, take Ianth's hand in yours.]|***ga_move-->String::pc_vig_wp Int::0 String::ianth |
Indeed.  Perhaps I will turn in after all.|***ga_global_int-->String::ianth_romance    String::0    |
I thank you, <FirstName>, for staying up with me.  I appreciate your fellowship--it has been long since I felt the bond of true friendship.  I had almost forgotten how much it meant.
I am honored to call you a friend, Ianth, and feel the same way.  Vroman has been a good friend too.
Indeed.  The two of you have been very kind to me.
Now I must resume my watch in silence.  Know that your company is appreciated, though, <FirstName>.
I am honored to call you a friend, Ianth, and feel the same way. Vroman and I are, well, more than friends, as you know.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False String::vroman_romance String::>0 |
Is it only friendship you feel for me, Ianth?  Is there nothing more?
[Taken aback.] Why...yes--but, oh! do not take that the wrong way. I did not know that you had any feelings for me, ! I have even less insight into Sune's mysteries than I thought, it seems.
[Abashed.] I hope it does not hurt you too deeply, , when I say that I do not think anything could develop between the two of us.
Think nothing of it.
If you say so, then I will not.
To be honest, this makes me feel wretched, Milady.

Do not feel wretched, , do not. The moment will not allow you! Even my recent despair pales in comparison to what tomorrow could bring. We have battled side by side--I hope that we continue to do so and continue to do so well.
Well, then, I am honored to be your friend.
I am glad to hear it, <FirstName>.
Again, do not take it amiss.
We both need rest. It would not be fair if you were to stay up while I slept. |***ga_global_int-->String::moral String::++ |
That is true, but this duty of mine outweighs the demands of fatigue.  You understand, of course.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False    String::moral    String::>6    |
In any case...
That is true, but this duty of mine outweighs the demands of fatigue.
[Jesting.] You're right, but it's warmer near the Flame Stone than it is in the cold grass. And I must admit the company is nice, too.|***ga_global_int-->String::ironic String::++ |
[Smiling.] You always are the first with something clever to say.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False String::ironic String::>3 |
[Nod.] Very well. I will turn in for the night.|***ga_global_int-->String::ianth_romance String::0 |
Of course.  Good night.
